DOC.detailed_description: This trial multi-center , open-label , randomize , parallel group trial patient T2DM compare efficacy safety Mylan 's insulin glargine Lantus® . Patients establish diagnosis T2DM per ADA 2014 criterion satisfy selection criterion include trial . This follow 24-week randomized , comparative , parallel-assignment treatment period Mylan 's insulin glargine Lantus® ( addition anti-diabetic drug ) . After treatment period , follow-up visit ; 4 week patient put back approved medication .
